main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.utils

Class TARUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.utils.TARUtils

  • public class TARUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating the TAR-archives that are used to export data from the TSE. Uses Apache Commons compress.
    Author:
    dpottkaemper

      static void createTARArchiveForExportCertificates(java.io.File[] certificatefilesToBeExported, java.lang.String[] certificateFileNames, long desiredMTime)
      Creates a TAR-archive using Apache Commons Compress containing only the certificate files.
      static void createTARArchiveForExportData(java.io.File infoFile, java.io.File[] logfilesToBeExported, java.lang.String[] logfileFileNames, java.io.File[] certificatefilesToBeExported, java.lang.String[] certificateFileNames, long desiredMTime)

    • Method Detail

      • createTARArchiveForExportData

        public static void createTARArchiveForExportData(java.io.File infoFile,
                                                 java.io.File[] logfilesToBeExported,
                                                 java.lang.String[] logfileFileNames,
                                                 java.io.File[] certificatefilesToBeExported,
                                                 java.lang.String[] certificateFileNames,
                                                 long desiredMTime)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        New method for creating a TAR-archive, now with the option to include more than one certificate file in the exported TAR-file. Uses Apache Commons Compress, the result should be in accordance with the TAR-archive structure mentioned in BSI TR-03151.
        Parameters:
        infoFile - info.csv file a a Java File object
        logfilesToBeExported - an array of the logfiles that are to be exported
        logfileFileNames - an array containing the names of said logfiles. Has to be in the same order as the logfiles in the logfilesToBeExported array
        certificatefilesToBeExported - an array of all certificate files used by the TSE-Simulator
        certificateFileNames - an array containing the names of said certificate files. Has to be in the same order as the certificate files in the certificatefilesToBeExported array
        desiredMTime - the time the archive was created, in this case, the export operation was started
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if either reading the content of a file fails and/or if writing to the TAR archive file fails.
        Could also be thrown by PropertyValues.getPathToNormalStorage() if PropertyValues.getInstance() throws this exception.
        Since:
        1.4

      • createTARArchiveForExportCertificates

        public static void createTARArchiveForExportCertificates(java.io.File[] certificatefilesToBeExported,
                                                         java.lang.String[] certificateFileNames,
                                                         long desiredMTime)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a TAR-archive using Apache Commons Compress containing only the certificate files. Since BSI TR-03151 chapter 4.5.2 lists only the export of certificate chains it should be the case, that only those are to be exported by the TSE. Contrary to this, the description of exportData in chapter 4.5.1 lists the log messages, the certificates and the information file. Therefore, a separate function for exporting certificates is needed.
        Parameters:
        certificatefilesToBeExported - a list of the certificate files that are to be exported
        certificateFileNames - the corresponding file names of the aforementioned certificate files in the same order as they appear in the certificate file array
        desiredMTime - the mtime that shall be set in every entry of the TAR archive
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if either reading the content of a file fails and/or if writing to the TAR archive file fails
        Since:
        1.4
